functions.name: sort_numbers
functions.description: Sorts a list of numbers in ascending order

input_parameters.name: numbers
input_parameters.description: Pointer to the array of numbers to be sorted

functions.body: Use a sorting algorithm such as quicksort or mergesort to sort the numbers. Iterate through the array, comparing each element to its neighbor. If the current element is greater than the next one, swap them. Continue this process until the array is sorted.
